problem.markdown: Which are the common assumptions considered while deriving the isentropic efficiency of a nozzle? [x] Adiabatic device [x] No stirrer work [x] No substantial potential energy change [ ] Exit pressure is much larger than the inlet pressure.
problem.p: Which are the common assumptions considered while deriving the isentropic efficiency of a nozzle?

checkboxgroup.choice: Exit pressure is much larger than the inlet pressure.
